name: Saudade
description:
Today I cried for missing him, and also for what we were... for how simple and incredible life was... My father taught me everything I am;

Homem sensível, de fé e de força ... 

homem de ferro e sorriso

Certeiro e preciso, vivo! 

Com os pés no chão 

e os olhos no céu, 

com o canto certo 

e o abraço amigo. 

O melhor amigo. 

O mestre e sacerdote, 

mago e alquimista.

A tribute to Pedro Ramos.
This song I composed in 2018, remembering my life as a child... And I really loved living it all, despite all the difficulties!

—-

—

—

—

This audio is from an unfinished authorial composition, recorded in 2018 with a motorola g2. The audio has not been altered or post-produced. The image is a photo, taken from a developed analog photo present in a family album.

In the image: me (the little boy) and my father, holding my sister ♥
